title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.130 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.130 - General

State Regulations

All sewage, including liquid waste, is to be disposed of in a public sewer system or by a sewage disposal system constructed and operated in a manner acceptable to the permit-issuing official. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-1.130

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
